name: Blueprint
description: You can stack blocks to make your own building. Your goal is to maintain the building height after disaster. There are total 48 levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 60 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 70 MB available space
